article_title: Citigroup Unit Pares Electronic-Trading Services Outside U.S.
article_text:
TORONTO—Automated Trading Desk LLC, a Citigroup Inc.-owned provider of electronic trading services, is paring back its non-U.S. business, closing operations in Canada—as well as Japan and Australia—according to people familiar with the matter.

ATD made the decision to pull out after declining trading volumes and regulatory changes made the business less profitable abroad, according to some of these people.

The Mount Pleasant,...
